meanings.definition: To devote (time, effort, or oneself) to a particular task or purpose.
meanings.sent1: She dedicates her mornings to studying for her exams.
meanings.sent2: He dedicates his weekends to volunteering at the local shelter.
meanings.sent3: The little girl dedicates her playtime to building sandcastles.
meanings.sent4: The athlete dedicates every practice session to improving his skills.
meanings.sent5: The chef dedicates hours to perfecting his signature dish.

meanings.definition: To inscribe or address (a work of art, book, etc.) to a person as a token of affection or respect.
meanings.sent1: The author dedicates her latest novel to her supportive family.
meanings.sent2: The artist dedicates each painting to a different muse for inspiration.
meanings.sent3: The musician dedicates his new song to his loyal fans.
meanings.sent4: The poet dedicates her heartfelt poem to the beauty of nature.
meanings.sent5: The sculptor dedicates his sculpture to the memory of his late mentor.
